src:
新東名でトラック炎上、一部区間で通行止め９時間

03 Nov 2019, 02:53

　２日午後１１時３５分頃、愛知県新城市川田の新東名高速道路下り線で、大型トラックから火が出たと、運転していた会社員男性（５１）から１１０番があった。消防が消火に当たったが、約１時間後に全焼した。男性にけがはなかった。
　県警高速隊によると、この火災で、新城インターチェンジ（ＩＣ）―岡崎東ＩＣ間が２日午後１１時４０分頃から３日午前８時５０分までの計９時間、通行止めになった。現場の路面が損傷したため、通行止め解除後も、２車線のうち、１車線（走行車線）を約５キロにわたって規制し、修復作業が行われている。
text:
Shintomei truck burns, closed for 9 hours in some sections

03 Nov 2019, 02:53

At around 11:35 pm on the 2nd, a fire came out of a large truck on the Shin-Tomei Expressway down line in Kawada, Shinshiro-shi, Aichi. The fire was extinguished, but it was completely burned after about 1 hour. The man was not injured.
According to the prefectural police high-speed corps, the Shinshiro Interchange (IC) and Okazaki Higashi IC were closed for 9 hours from 11:40 pm on the 2nd to 8:50 am on the 3rd due to this fire. Because the road surface at the site was damaged, even after the suspension of road closure, one lane (traveling lane) out of the two lanes is restricted over about 5 km and repair work is being carried out.
